name: Snake Eyes (Try Your Luck)
description:
You find yourself in a dungeon .. and you randomly roll? What is this, some kind of bizarre form of torture?

Guess you'll have to find the exit to get some answers... 

How to Play: Press "R" to roll, and then Click to choose a move.

Art Used

  • https://pixel-poem.itch.io/dungeon-assetpuck
  • https://kicked-in-teeth.itch.io/dice-roll 

Audio Used

  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-casual-game-sfx-pack-5...
  • https://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/music.html
